definition: to take unfair advantage of/to deceive/to cheat
to deceive/to cheat/to hoodwink/to make a wild guess

sentences.english: Perhaps this concealment, this disguise, was beneath me.
sentences.chinese: 我這樣隱瞞，這樣欺矇，也許失掉了我自己的身份。

sentences.english: That will be the climatic deception of Satan.
sentences.chinese: 那將是撒但欺矇的高峯。
